Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class ModelUtils

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ModelUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ModelUtils
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
It extract from the model the battlefield, the turn and all player. Then it is sent to the client.
